website_summaries.verdict: Striking and bold stainless steel unisex Gucci watch with green and red stripes as well as the distinctive double 'G' logo.
pros: Fashionable and quality timepiece with Swiss quartz movement
Unisex case is 36 millimeters for those who prefer a larger watch
cons: A basic analog watch despite the SYNC name

customer_reviews.title: nice watch L too small for a men watch
customer_reviews.text: nice watch L too small for a men watch, looks much better on screen, it s just a nice gucci watch, nice pics but when you have the watch in ur hands you r like ummm just a watch
customer_reviews.author: YAAV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Bought it for a gift and they loved it! And it was shipped in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Alli T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I purchased 2 more for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brabham

customer_reviews.title: Nice , but it is a female size!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool watch, however the L size is a female size. I exchanged it for the XXL size and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I sent it back, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I sent it back. Quality is nice, price is unnecessary. This isn't a Rolex. I sent this one back and bought a watch from Walmart for $15, and it has more features.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bare

customer_reviews.title: My Review on the Gucci Sync watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Gucci Sync watch I just purchase, I fits great the style and the look is what I was look for not to flashy but I love the detail. This is a great product and you can't beat the price either. All around I feel like I benefitted on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Watch the machine came to me defective when stopped. ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch the machine came to me defective when stopped. you change the battery and continue the prblem . I am in Venezuela and here there gucci me to rectify the problem
customer_reviews.author: Merlin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Gucci Sync
customer_reviews.text: Great watch although im not sure why they call it sync and what does it sync to? other then that the watch is ok.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly h.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THISSS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WATCH, I BOUGHT XXL FOR ME AND L FOR MY DEAR, VERY HAPPY WITH MY GUCCI WACHT
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gregorio Diaz Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: blingchick
customer_reviews.text: Very sporty and sexy for a woman I simply love it fits almost style and you dress it up or wear it down
customer_reviews.author: Lequitta Wilson

customer_reviews.title: fashionable
customer_reviews.text: very nice watch, have not worn it yet, I wish that the face of the watch could be just a tab larger.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Please i want to change the size of the watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is so beautiful ..I bought it last April for my husband birthday gift but I ordered for him the Large size .. I was faraway from him as he lives in USA and I live in Dubai .. so I came before few days and told him why you are not wearing the watch then I discover that it's small on his wrist and he does not want to tell me.. so please if you could help me to change it as its useless now and I am so sad for that :(
customer_reviews.author: rana

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for sport or formal evenings
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend adores this watch, and has received a ton of compliments about it. It is impossible to read the time in the dark but the way the watch face is constructed really stands out, and the sporty yet metallic look makes it very wearable for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Y. Chung

feature_bullets: Bold stainless steel watch with signature red and green stripes on crown and band, double "G" logo on dial, and translucent edging on case
Unisex watch. Case: 36mm. stainless steel case with mineral dial window; nylon case
Swiss quartz movement with analog display
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
